FILE: cm350666v11.0.txt
DYAD: GREECE - ISRAEL
RIVALRY: RIV933
DISPUTE(S): MID3177 

PS-NOTES:

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20190315
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20190318

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID3177 

TERRMID: MID3177 3 -- not territory 
TERRMID-CER: MID3177 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID3177 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID3177 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID3177 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID3177 3 -- uncertain 
MARITMID-NOTES: MID3177 from Gibler, Miller, and Little 2016, Israel seized a Greek freighter that was carrying arms to Palestinian fighters in Lebanon. However, there was no protest from Greece. Coded not maritime because no maritime boundary was being disputed, and coded uncertain because GML argue this case should be dropped due to no protest from Greece. 

ISLMID: MID3177 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID3177 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID3177 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID3177 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID3177 1 -- civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID3177 3 -- uncertain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: MID3177 coded civil war link because per GML 2016, this was connected to Palestinian rebels in Lebanon, outside this dyad. Coded uncertain because GML 2016 recommend this case be dropped. 

COUPMID: MID3177 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID3177 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID3177 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID3177 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

RIVNOTES: 

NARRATIVE-CM:

SOURCES-CM:

NARRATIVE-CR:

SOURCES-CR:

SOURCES: Gibler, D. M., S. V. Miller, and E. K. Little. 2016. "An Analysis of the Militarized Interstate Dispute (MID) Dataset, 1816-2001." International Studies Quarterly. 60 (4): 719-730.
